data.title: Curse of the Jade Scorpon Movie Cast And Credits
data.meta_description: Complete film credits from Woody Allen's 2001 film Curse of the Jade Scorpion.
data.text:
Full Cast & Credits from Curse of the Jade Scorpion

Directed by

Woody Allen

Writing credits (WGA)

Woody Allen

John Schuck .... Mize
